work_performed: Fire safety system annual inspection completed - all panels passed. Sprinkler test on floors 1-20.
Elevator annual certification by Otis - car 1 and 2 passed. Cars 3 and 4 scheduled tomorrow.
Elevator certification completed for cars 3 and 4. All 4 elevators certified through Feb 2026.
HVAC spring startup - replaced 200 filters across units. Central chiller inspected and operational.
Pool resurfacing project began - pool drained and old surface removal started. Temporary pool closure signs posted.
Pool resurfacing delayed 2 days due to heavy rain. Drainage work continued in covered areas.
delays: Rain delay - 2 days added to pool schedule

work_performed: Pool resurfacing complete and pool refilled. Chemical balance testing in progress - reopening in 48 hours.
Hurricane preparedness drill conducted - all staff participated. Emergency supplies inventory verified.
Parking garage power washing began on level P1. Traffic management plan in effect.
Roof membrane inspection - 3 areas identified for patching. No major structural concerns.
Emergency generator load bank test - 4-hour test at full load. All systems passed.
Exterior painting touch-up started on floors 1-5. Swing stage installed on south face.
Exterior painting completed through floor 10. All swing stages removed.
Security camera upgrade project kicked off - new IP camera installation began in parking garage.
HVAC winter prep started - boiler inspection and heating system tests across all floors.
Tropical storm warning - activated hurricane plan. Secured outdoor furniture and pool area.
safety_incidents: 1 minor injury - staff member slipped on wet lobby floor
delays: Outdoor work suspended due to weather

work_performed: Holiday lighting installation started in lobby and exterior common areas.
Year-end unit inspections scheduled to begin. Notification letters sent to all residents.
